title: Emulators Dock.7z
description:
Hi generic freeware tools fans ...

This is tool that taked close a month to be made and was inspired in Object dock plus , the well known shortcuts launcher from the desktop , i prepared the tool to be ready to launch 30 emulators (best possible and updated) that represents more than 40 consoles , this tool have an internal games folder and a quick searcher for the best rom sites to get games easily to adicionate on the games folder to play the consoles on the emulators , EVERYTHING is portable ... the main tool and the emulators are all portable , only the folders stands outside with the files running in pack only open when the programs are launch , giving a clean pratical view , i hope all of you that will try this tool will like ...

ok bye for now and see all of you around piratebay ...



CONSOLES :

- Atari Jaguar  - Atari Lynx   - Atari ST   - Bandai Wonderswan
- Capcom   - SNK Neo-Geo  - Commodore 64   - Commodore Amiga
- DosBox  - Gameboy  - Gameboy Color  - Gameboy Advance   - MAME
- Java Mobile    - MSX   - Colecovision   - Neo-Geo CD   - Neo-Geo Pocket Color
- Nintendo 64   - Nintendo DS   - NES   - Famicom   - Nintendo Virtual Boy
- Panasonic 3DO   - PC Engine   - TurboGrafx   - Phillips CDi 
- Playstation 1   - Playstation 2   - Playstation Portable   - Scumm VM
- Sega CD   - Sega 32X  - Sega GameGear   - Sega GenesisMegadrive
- Sega Mastersystem   - Sega Dreamcast   - Sega Saturn   - Super Nintendo
- Nintendo WII   - Nintendo Gamecube   - ZX Spectrum


PS :. Install Daemon Tools Lite to play the Sega Saturn emulator and PC games in case of not installed yet of course ...
